ResourceHeader.ResourceName: LineupCAT - a catalog of multipoint solar storm observations
ResourceHeader.Description: This is the HELIO4CAST LineupCAT, a catalog for interplanetary coronal mass ejections (ICMEs) observed by multiple spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: event
Parameter.Description: event: To which multipoint event the row belongs to, unit: integer.

Parameter.Name: lineupcat_id
Parameter.Description: lineupcat_id: Observations that are assigned to the same ICME are given the same ID. unit: string.

Parameter.Name: event_start_time
Parameter.Description: event_start_time: For in situ spacecraft, similar to icme_start_time in the ICMECAT. For STEREO-A-HI (HIA), its the see_launch_time from HIGeoCAT, for DONKI its time21_5 from the DONKI database. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: spacecraft
Parameter.Description: spacecraft: HIA if the entry refers to observations from STEREO-A-HI; STEREO A: SECCHI/COR2, SOHO: LASCO/C2 if the entry refers to coronagraph observations by either STEREO-A or SOHO; otherwise the in situ observing spacecraft. unit: string.

Parameter.Name: sc_heliodistance
Parameter.Description: sc_heliodistance: Heliocentric distance of the spacecraft at event_start_time. unit: AU

Parameter.Name: sc_long_heeq
Parameter.Description: sc_long_heeq: Heliospheric longitude of the spacecraft at event_start_time, range [-180,180]. unit: degree (HEEQ).

Parameter.Name: sc_lat_heeq
Parameter.Description: sc_lat_heeq: Heliospheric latitude of the spacecraft at event_start_time, range [-180,180]. unit: degree (HEEQ).

Parameter.Name: cme_long_heeq
Parameter.Description: cme_long_heeq: CME longitude, derived either from SSEF30 modeling with STEREO-A-HI or SWPC CAT with STEREO A: SECCHI/COR2 or SOHO: LASCO/C2, range [-180,180]. unit: degree (HEEQ)

Parameter.Name: speed
Parameter.Description: speed: For in situ observations, the speed over the whole ICME interval (icme_speed_mean in ICMECAT). For HIA, the speed derived from SSEF30 modeling in HIGeoCAT. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: mo_bmax
Parameter.Description: mo_bmax: Only for in situ observations, maximum total magnetic field in the magnetic obstacle interval (mo_start_time to mo_end_time). unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bzmin
Parameter.Description: mo_bzmin: Only for in situ observations, minimum magnetic field Bz component in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT (RTN).

Parameter.Name: catalog_id.
Parameter.Description: catalog_id: the id from either the ICMECAT or HIGeoCAT, allowing to look up the event directly in these other catalogs.

Parameter.Name: source
Parameter.Description: source: Solar source region as given in DONKI.
